sentences.en: Pakistan denies sponsoring any insurgent groups.
sentences.cn: 巴基斯坦否认资助任何反叛组织。

sentences.en: Playing insurgent basketball did not guarantee victory.
sentences.cn: 像游击队那样打篮球并不一定能带来胜利。

sentences.en: A fifth soldier was killed in an insurgent attack in eastern Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 第五名士兵在阿富汗东部的一次反叛分子袭击中丧生。
